entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 11 March 2023
